Reviews.Title: Horrible video quality
Reviews.Author: Sunshine C Sears
Reviews.Content: I have ran several different cables now and these do not work right.  The video from the cameras on these appear blurry.  Buy a different cable.  Don't waist your time or money on these.....

ProductInfo.Features:
100% Copper made; quality Assured.
Two pieces of BNC to RCA converters are provided for each cable to connect to a camera with RCA connection.
The 66 Feet video power cable will allow you to transmit video signal and supply DC power for all kind of security   cameras.
Ready for Plug and play. Each cable comes with BNC video connector and 2.1 mm center positive power plug at each end.
2 Pack and 4 Pack are also offered for your choice.
ProductInfo.Name: SainSonic 4 Pack 66 Feet 20M Digital Video Power Security Camera Cable for CCTV Surveillance, DVR Camera Power & BNC Video Cable with FREE BNC to RCA Connectors
